short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts and displays GTIN/EAN from various e-commerce websites including Notino and Flaconi

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline Your Online Shopping with this GTIN Extractor

Instantly reveals product GTINs and EANs across multiple e-commerce platforms, enabling clear and unmistakable identification of items. This extension simplifies comparison shopping, price checking, and product verification, making online purchases easier and more informed for everyone.

Key features include:
- Automatically detects and displays GTINs/EANs on supported websites
- Works seamlessly with popular retailers
- Enhances product research and price comparison
- Helps avoid confusion between similar products
- Ideal for savvy shoppers, resellers, and anyone who wants more transparency in online shopping

Empower your online shopping experience with GTIN Extractor â€“ your tool for smarter, more efficient product identification and comparison.
